author: Bethesda Softworks
description:
Be a part of history. Together. 

Join your fellow players to combat the Worm Cult in the Battle for the Writhing Wall world-changing event. Fight for your server through three phases to unlock access to Eastern Solstice (2025 Content Pass required and a host of special rewards, including a new mount, pet, styles, and more. 

The Battle for the Writhing Wall one time in-game event is now live and will continue while the wall still stands. 

Visit the event’s landing page at elderscrollsonline.com/writhingwall to see your server’s progress and learn how you can do your part for the war effort. Solstice and the Stirk Fellowship need you!

Official Site: https://www.elderscrollsonline.com
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/ElderScrollsOnline
Bluesky: https://bsky.app/profile/elderscrollsonline.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/TESOnline
Instagram: https://instagram.com/elderscrollsonline

ESRB Rating: MATURE with Blood and Gore, Sexual Themes, Use of Alcohol, and Violence. Online interacti
title: The Elder Scrolls Online - Battle for the Writhing Wall
